intro.title: Introduction
intro.p1: This Privacy Policy describes how Karyne de Clercq Real Estate collects, uses, shares and protects your personal information.
intro.p2: By using our service, you agree to the practices described in this policy.
intro.p3: We are committed to protecting your privacy in accordance with GDPR and UAE laws.

section1.title: 1. Data Collected
section1.item1: Registration data: name, email, phone, password
section1.item2: Lead data: client information, budget, property type

section3.title: 3. Data Sharing
section3.intro: We never sell your data. Limited sharing:
section3.item1: ✓ With the real estate agent to process your leads
section3.item2: ✓ Legal authorities if required by law (RERA)
section3.item4: ✗ Never sold to marketing third parties

section4.title: 4. Your GDPR Rights
section4.contact: Contact contact@real-estate-referrer.com to exercise your rights (response within 30 days)

cta.title: Questions about your data?
cta.subtitle: Feel free to contact us. Response within 30 days maximum.
